q1: I can talk about this team all day
a1: What is it that you like about them?
q2: Their attitude. Why do you think players seem to want to play for Bayern Munich more?
a2: Bayern are a very big club that has been more successful recently.
q3: BVB Dortmund has grown much more than Bayern in the last 10 years. Compare where Bayern was 10 years ago and is now. And compare where Dortmund was 10 years ago. Dortmunders have done a much better job.
a3: BVB Dortmund is definitely a much better team than Bayern Munich.
q4: I’d say Bayern are better than Dortmund overall
a4: the reason that Bayern is so good is because the club has the most money. I really think Dortmund is better than bayern and I like their attitude
q5: I really like the colors of BVB Dortmund.
